Medium: Lithograph, offset printed in the newspaper The Evening Standard and one duplicate copy
Dimensions: composition: 9 1/16 x 7 11/16" (23 x 19.6 cm); sheet (two-page spread): 16 9/16 x 25 3/16" (42 x 64 cm)
Artist: Gilbert & George, Gilbert Proesch, George Passmore
Title: Morning Light on Art for All
